TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CngUIPolicy extends System.Object

summary.span: 封装访问受保护密钥时下一代加密技术 (CNG) 所显示用户界面 (UI) 的可选配置参数。

span.span: Encapsulates optional configuration parameters for the user interface (UI) that Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) displays when you access a protected key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类使你能够创建 UI 策略，用于显示有关关键操作（如智能卡 PIN 提示）的提示。This class enables you to create a UI policy for displaying prompts about key operations such as smart card PIN prompts. 它还使你能够强制用户交互访问密钥，即使密钥存储在软件密钥存储提供程序 (KSP) 而不是智能卡中。It also enables you to enforce user interaction to access a key, even if the key is stored in a software key storage provider (KSP) instead of in a smart card. 在访问受保护的密钥时，CNG 为 UI 显示这些配置参数。CNG displays these configuration parameters for the UI when you access a protected key.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数在 UI 提示方案中设置密钥的保护级别。This constructor sets the protection level for the key in UI prompting scenarios.
